synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involves weighing lithium sulfide, phosphorus pentoxide, and lithium iodide in a glove box under an Ar atmosphere to achieve specific molar ratios, milling the mixture in a planetary ball mill with dehydrated heptane, drying the sample to obtain a sulfide solid electrolyte material with a composition of 10LiI · 90(0.75Li2S · 0.25P2S5).
